source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a wide shot of a modern city street in Japan on a bright, sunny day. The scene features clean sidewalks, contemporary buildings, and a multi-lane road lined with trees. There is light traffic on the road and a few pedestrians on the sidewalk.
